main event: A civilian observed two triangular objects changing colors in the sky for about 30 minutes in Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from white to red, blue, yellow, and green.,Both objects were initially together but then separated, with one disappearing gradually.,One object remained stationary while the other moved southwest.,The observation was classified as ground visual.,The objects appeared to waver in flight during the observation.
witness description: the observer stated the objects were seen by several members of his family and by neighbors.
